name: webar-image-tracking
description: WebAR Image Tracking with WASM-powered computer vision

scripts.dev: npm run build:wasm && npm run serve
scripts.watch:wasm: nodemon --watch wasm/src --watch wasm/include --ext cpp,hpp --exec 'npm run build:wasm'
scripts.test: echo 'No automated tests yet - test in browser'
scripts.size: ls -lh public/wasm/*.wasm public/wasm/*.js 2>/dev/null || echo 'No WASM files built yet. Run: npm run build:wasm'
